subject: Sir,
body:
Sir,
I will make transfer of your USD4.8 Million United State Dollars in few hours
Send your complete bank account details just now so i can transfer
your funds in few hours.
Please respond
Regards
John Anderson

subject: Re:   Sir,
body:
Dear John Anderson,

I appreciate your prompt response. However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding with the transfer. Could you please provide more details about the transaction? Specifically, I would like to know the source of these funds and why they are being transferred to me.

Best wishes,
Francis
